name: isa
author: Ohtufox
description: Security add-on that gives user information about the safety of their password field data.

preferences.name: passwordPeek
preferences.title: Password peek is enabled
preferences.description: While enabled, on the safe password fields an icon appears that allows you to peek your password.

preferences.name: showIcons
preferences.title: Always show eye icon on https pages
preferences.description: Show icon on https pages even if target page is unknown (will work only if password peek is enabled).

preferences.name: SSLRedirect
preferences.title: SSL redirect is enabled
preferences.description: While enabled, if secure version of unsecure page exists, you are redirected to it
